# eslint/no-empty

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallows empty block statements

### Why is this bad?

Empty block statements, while not technically errors, usually occur due to refactoring that wasnâ€™t completed.
They can cause confusion when reading code.

### Example

```javascript
if (condition) {
}
```
